name: Stranded (itch) (blackbeacon, Juan Francisco Mora, Adrián Moreno Gómez)
name_original: Stranded (itch) (blackbeacon, Juan Francisco Mora, Adrián Moreno Gómez)
description:
Stranded is a game about a lost survivor, you must take decisions to survive while you look for the hidden lighthouse.

This game was made in 72 hours for the Jam Jam Talentum Online.

Controls 
  • WASD / Arrow Keys / Right click -> Move boat
  • M -> Open Map
Credits
  • Juan Francisco Mora Palomino (@JfranMora) (Programmer, Audio, UI / UX)
  • Adrián Moreno Gómez (@AdriMG96) (2D / 3D Artist)
